name: BiMusic
introduction: A networking platform that allows artists to connect with producers and musicians. SPA built as the final project of the Ironhack Web Development Bootcamp, using React and node.js

description.descr: Users can upload samples or finished songs showcasing their work within a community of other musicians.
Users can find and scout musicians profiles turning ideas into a finished collaboration.
Users can post comments under music projects sharing ideas and suggestions.
Users can contact each other directly via an internal chat to exchange information (project related).

name: HelgaHelps
introduction: Second project of the Ironhack Web Devolopment Bootcamp. A festival planner app, built using node.js, express.js, mongoose, mongoDB, handlebars, Rest API.

description.descr: Connect with the group of people you like to go on a festival with.
Add all the festivals to your group, you and your crew what to go to.
Are you going to drive and have some empty seats to fill? Post your car with all the neccessary information about departure, return and available seats, so your friends can join.

description.feature: Add bands to your personal setlist
description.descr: Plan ahead and add all your favourite acts to your personal list, to make sure not to miss any. You can even see who else of your crew is eager to see them perform live on stage, so you don't have to go alone.
Listen to previews of the top tracks of the bands coming to your festival, in order to get in the right mood for the upcoming event.

name: Climbing Game
introduction: Browser game built using p5js. First project of the Ironhack Web Development Bootcamp.

description.descr: The background is continuously moving top to bottom and makes the climber appear to be climbing up. Use the left/right arrows to move the player. Pressing the space bar will put your quickdraw in a bolt (level 2).

Rocks falling from the top will decrease your energy. Catch a helmet, it will protect you from the rocks (but only once!). Collect quickdraws, as you will need them to win this game. Eat a granola, in order to recharge your energy a bit.
Collect enough quickdraws and wear a helmet to finish this level. Avoid the rocks, they will lower your energy. Being too tired ends the game.

Attach the quickdraws you've collected in the previous level to the bolts. This will keep you save during the climb. Missing a bolt means a decrease in your safety. Being too tired or climbing without being save will end the game.
